## Test Matplotlib Plot

```{python}
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

# Simple test plot
x = np.linspace(0, 10, 100)
y = np.sin(x)

plt.figure(figsize=(8, 4))
plt.plot(x, y)
plt.xlabel('X')
plt.ylabel('Y')
plt.title('Test Plot')
plt.grid(True)
plt.show()
```

This should show a simple sine wave plot.
